articles.author: Evens Sanon and Danica Coto
articles.title: 2 Haitian Americans detained in slaying of Haiti president - CTV News
articles.description: Two men believed to be Haitian Americans - one of them purportedly a former bodyguard at the Canadian Embassy in Port au Prince - have been arrested in connection with the assassination of Haiti's president, a senior Haitian official said Thursday.
articles.content:
PORT-AU-PRINCE, HAITI --

articles.title: US jobless claims tick up to 373,000 from a pandemic low - Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The number of Americans filing for unemployment benefits rose slightly last week even while the economy and the job market appear to be rebounding from the coronavirus recession with sustained energy.

articles.title: Virtually all new Covid deaths and hospitalizations are among unvaccinated people, White House says - CNBC
articles.description: President Joe Biden's Covid team has set its sights on those Americans who are still unvaccinated against the coronavirus, amid the delta variant's spread.

articles.title: 'Toughest game I ever played' - Bonucci hails Italy heart after Azzurri 'suffer' through win over Spain - Goal.com
articles.description: Newly-hired RB Leipzig manager Jesse Marsch says that Caden Clark has both the personality and the playing ability to shine in Germany as he said the American teenager has "borderline cockiness" that will help him adjust to the pressures of Europe.
